sen.j: 喜多七太夫（きた ななだゆう）とは、シテ方喜多流の宗家が名乗る名のひとつ。
sen.e: Shichidayu KITA is one of the names used by the head family of the shite-kata Kita school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).
sen.cmt: 名前の正しい読み方は「しちだゆう」です。
sen.e: Shichidayu KITA is one of the names used by the head family of the shite-kata Kita school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).
Shichidayu KITA is one of the names used by the head family of the shite-kata Kita school (one of the five schools of shite-kata [main roles]).

sen.j: 流祖・喜多七太夫長能、九世七太夫古能が著名。
sen.e: KITA Shichidayu Nagayoshi, the founder of the school, and Shichidayu Hisayoshi, the 9th headmaster of the school, are well known.
sen.cmt: 『朝日日本歴史人物事典:江戸前期の能役者。シテ方喜多流の初代大夫。ながよし。通名は七大夫。』『Wikipedia喜多七太夫長能 ちょうのう/おさよし』前者の方が漢字、読み方共、正確だと思われますので、後者の読みを採用しました。
sen.e: KITA Shichidayu Nagayoshi, the founder of the school, and Shichidayu Hisayoshi, the 9th headmaster of the school, are well known.
KITA Shichidayu Nagayoshi, the founder of the school, and Shichidayu Hisayoshi, the 9th headmaster of the school, are well known.
